meanings.definition: Of or relating to the anus.
meanings.sent1: The doctor performed an anal examination.
meanings.sent2: She bought anal cream for her skin condition.
meanings.sent3: He joked that the car wash was so thorough, it felt anal.
meanings.sent4: The detective had an anal attention to detail.
meanings.sent5: The chef's anal focus on hygiene made the kitchen spotless.

meanings.sent1: Her anal organizing made everything neat and tidy.
meanings.sent2: He was so anal about his schedule that he planned every minute.
meanings.sent3: The cat's anal grooming routine amused the family.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's anal grading system left no room for error.
meanings.sent5: His anal nature made him the perfect accountant for the job.

meanings.definition: A person who is meticulous or fussy.
meanings.sent1: The anal in the office always checked every detail.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the anal of the group due to her perfectionism.
meanings.sent3: The anal at the party made sure everything was in order.
meanings.sent4: He was the anal of the team, ensuring everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The anal's attention to detail saved the project from failure.
